text:
#Dolphins TE Mike Gesicki is very likely to join David Njoku and get the franchise tag.

The question remains if the #Cowboys will use theirs Dalton Schultz or not. Blake Jarwin dealing with a serious injury might further put pressure on Dallas to tag Schultz.
retweet_text:

text: So, reports out of Denver are that the Broncos are ready to offer the 9th pick this year, their second-round pick this year and next year’s first for Aaron Rodgers. To beat that, the Steelers would have to offer more. Anyone really believe that’s happening? Or prudent?
